WorkItem.Description:
If you add text to a cell using 
```
$text = "Foo \n Bar";
$objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->setCellValue('B2', $text);
```
the result in the cell will be

Foo
Bar
Foo
Bar
WorkItem.Summary: Adding \n (newline) to text duplicates the cell contents

Comments.Message: Please take a look at `01simple.php` in `/Examples`, which populates cell `A8` with `"Hello\nWorld"` and doesn't duplicate it.... simply setting a cell with a value containing a `\n` doesn't duplicate the cell contents at all. There must be something else that you're doing here to create duplication of the text.
